import react, {useState} from 'react' import { TextField, MenuItem, InputAdornment, Button} from '@material-ui/core' import SaveIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Save' import styles from './styles' import { useForm} from 'react-hook-form' import {db} from '../../services/firebase' export default function DrugForm(){ const tiposMedicamento = ['Gato chiquito', 'Rata grande', 'Perros tontos'] const{register, handleSubmit} = useForm() const onSubmit = (values) =>{ console.log(values) db.collection("drug").doc().set(values) } return( <>

Hola este va a ser el formulario para registrar medicamentos

{ if(!ref) return; register({name:"tipo", value: ref.value}) }} fullWidth id="tipo" select label="Tipo de medicamento.." helperText="Por favor selecciona el tipo de medicamento" > {tiposMedicamento.map((tipo) => ( {tipo} ))}
$, }} />
) } /* asincronico funciones de primer orden map, reduce, filter... objects function flecha */
